verses.verse: Then <WG5119> some Pharisees <WG5330> and scribes <WG1122> came <WG4334> to Jesus <WG2424> from Jerusalem, <WG2414> saying, <WG3004>

"Why <WG1223> <WG5101> do Your disciples <WG3101> transgress <WG3845> the tradition <WG3862> of the elders <WG4245>? For they do not wash <WG3538> their hands <WG5495> when <WG3752> they eat <WG2068> bread. <WG740>"

And He answered <WG611> and said <WG3004> to them, "And why <WG1223> <WG5101> do you yourselves <WG4771> transgress <WG3845> the commandment <WG1785> of God <WG2316> for the sake <WG1223> of your tradition <WG3862>?

"For God <WG2316> said, <WG3004> 'Honor <WG5091> your father <WG3962> and mother, <WG3384>' and, 'He who speaks <WG2551> evil <WG2551> of father <WG3962> or <WG2228> mother, <WG3384> let him be put <WG5053> to death. <WG2288>'

"But you say, <WG3004> 'Whoever <WG3739> <WG302> shall say <WG3004> to [his] father <WG3962> or <WG2228> mother, <WG3384> "Anything <WG3739> <WG1437> of mine <WG1473> you might have been helped <WG5623> by has been given <WG1435> [to God,]"

he is not to honor <WG5091> his father <WG3962> or <WG2228> his mother. <WG3384>' And [thus] you invalidated <WG208> the word <WG3056> of God <WG2316> for the sake <WG1223> of your tradition. <WG3862>
"You hypocrites, <WG5273> rightly <WG2573> did Isaiah <WG2268> prophesy <WG4395> of you, saying, <WG3004>
'This <WG3778> people <WG2992> honors <WG5091> Me with their lips, <WG5491> But their heart <WG2588> is far <WG4206> away <WG568> from Me.
'But in vain <WG3155> do they worship <WG4576> Me, Teaching <WG1321> as doctrines <WG1319> the precepts <WG1778> of men. <WG444>' "
And after He called <WG4341> the multitude <WG3793> to Him, He said <WG3004> to them, "Hear, <WG191> and understand. <WG4920>

"Not what <WG3588> enters <WG1525> into the mouth <WG4750> defiles <WG2840> the man, <WG444> but what <WG3588> proceeds <WG1607> out of the mouth, <WG4750> this <WG3778> defiles <WG2840> the man. <WG444>"

Then <WG5119> the disciples <WG3101> came <WG4334> and said <WG3004> to Him, "Do You know <WG3609> that the Pharisees <WG5330> were offended <WG4624> when they heard <WG191> this <WG3588> statement <WG3056>?"
But He answered <WG611> and said, <WG3004> "Every <WG3956> plant <WG5451> which <WG3739> My heavenly <WG3770> Father <WG3962> did not plant <WG5452> shall be rooted <WG1610> up.

"Let <WG863> them alone; <WG863> they are blind <WG5185> guides <WG3595> of the blind. <WG5185> And if <WG1437> a blind <WG5185> man <WG5185> guides <WG3594> a blind <WG5185> man, <WG5185> both <WG297> will fall <WG4098> into a pit. <WG999>"
And Peter <WG4074> answered <WG611> and said <WG3004> to Him, "Explain <WG5419> the parable <WG3850> to us."
And He said, <WG3004> "Are you still <WG188> lacking <WG801> in understanding <WG801> also <WG2532>?
"Do you not understand <WG3539> that everything <WG3956> that goes <WG1531> into the mouth <WG4750> passes <WG5562> into the stomach, <WG2836> and is eliminated <WG1519> <WG856> <WG1544>?
"But the things that proceed <WG1607> out of the mouth <WG4750> come <WG1831> from the heart, <WG2588> and those <WG2548> defile <WG2840> the man. <WG444>

"For out of the heart <WG2588> come <WG1831> evil <WG4190> thoughts, <WG1261> murders, <WG5408> adulteries, <WG3430> fornications, <WG4202> thefts, <WG2829> false <WG5577> witness, <WG5577> slanders. <WG988>
"These <WG3778> are the things which defile <WG2840> the man; <WG444> but to eat <WG2068> with unwashed <WG449> hands <WG5495> does not defile <WG2840> the man. <WG444>"
And Jesus <WG2424> went <WG1831> away <WG1831> from there, <WG1564> and withdrew <WG402> into the district <WG3313> of Tyre <WG5184> and Sidon. <WG4605>

And behold, <WG2400> a Canaanite <WG5478> woman <WG1135> came <WG1831> out from that region, <WG3725> and [began] to cry <WG2896> out, saying, <WG3004> "Have <WG1653> mercy <WG1653> on me, O Lord, <WG2962> Son <WG5207> of David; <WG7035> my daughter <WG2364> is cruelly <WG2560> demon-possessed."

But He did not answer <WG611> her a word. <WG3056> And His disciples <WG3101> came <WG4334> to [Him] and kept asking <WG2065> Him, saying, <WG3004> "Send <WG630> her away, <WG630> for she is shouting <WG2896> out after <WG3693> us."
But He answered <WG611> and said, <WG3004> "I was sent <WG649> only <WG3756> <WG1487> <WG3361> to the lost <WG622> sheep <WG4263> of the house <WG3624> of Israel. <WG2474>"
But she came <WG2064> and [began] to bow <WG4352> down <WG4352> before <WG4352> Him, saying, <WG3004> "Lord, <WG2962> help <WG997> me!"
And He answered <WG611> and said, <WG3004> "It is not good <WG2570> to take <WG2983> the children's bread <WG740> and throw <WG906> it to the dogs. <WG2952>"
But she said, <WG3004> "Yes, <WG3483> Lord; <WG2962> but even <WG2532> the dogs <WG2952> feed <WG2068> on the crumbs <WG5589> which fall <WG4098> from their masters' table. <WG5132>"

Then <WG5119> Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> and said <WG3004> to her, "O <WG5599> woman, <WG1135> your faith <WG4102> is great; <WG3173> be it done <WG1096> for you as you wish. <WG2309>" And her daughter <WG2364> was healed <WG2390> at once. <WG1565> <WG5610>

And departing <WG3327> from there, <WG1564> Jesus <WG2424> went <WG2064> along <WG3844> by the Sea <WG2281> of Galilee, <WG1056> and having gone <WG305> up to the mountain, <WG3735> He was sitting <WG2521> there. <WG1563>

And great <WG4183> multitudes <WG3793> came <WG4334> to Him, bringing <WG2192> with them [those who were] lame, <WG5560> crippled, <WG2948> blind, <WG5185> dumb, <WG2974> and many <WG4183> others, <WG2087> and they laid <WG4496> them down <WG4496> at His feet; <WG4228> and He healed <WG2323> them,

so <WG5620> that the multitude <WG3793> marveled <WG2296> as they saw <WG991> the dumb <WG2974> speaking, <WG2980> the crippled <WG2948> restored, <WG5199> and the lame <WG5560> walking, <WG4043> and the blind <WG5185> seeing; <WG991> and they glorified <WG1392> the God <WG2316> of Israel. <WG2474>

And Jesus <WG2424> called <WG4341> His disciples <WG3101> to Him, and said, <WG3004> "I feel <WG4697> compassion <WG4697> for the multitude, <WG3793> because <WG3754> they have remained <WG4357> with Me now <WG2235> three <WG5140> days <WG2250> and have <WG2192> nothing <WG3756> <WG5100> to eat; <WG2068> and I do not wish <WG2309> to send <WG630> them away <WG630> hungry, <WG3523> lest <WG3379> they faint <WG1590> on the way. <WG3598>"

And the disciples <WG3101> said <WG3004> to Him, "Where <WG4159> would we get so <WG5118> many <WG5118> loaves <WG740> in a desolate <WG2047> place <WG2047> to satisfy <WG5526> such <WG5118> a great <WG5118> multitude <WG3793>?"
And Jesus <WG2424> said <WG3004> to them, "How <WG4214> many <WG4214> loaves <WG740> do you have <WG2192>?" And they said, <WG3004> "Seven, <WG2033> and a few <WG3641> small <WG2485> fish. <WG2485>"
And He directed <WG3853> the multitude <WG3793> to sit <WG377> down <WG377> on the ground; <WG1093>

and He took <WG2983> the seven <WG2033> loaves <WG740> and the fish; <WG2486> and giving <WG2168> thanks, <WG2168> He broke <WG2806> them and started giving <WG1325> them to the disciples, <WG3101> and the disciples <WG3101> [in turn,] to the multitudes. <WG3793>

And they all <WG3956> ate, <WG2068> and were satisfied, <WG5526> and they picked <WG142> up what <WG3588> was left <WG4052> over <WG4052> of the broken <WG2801> pieces, <WG2801> seven <WG2033> large <WG4711> baskets <WG4711> full. <WG4134>
And those <WG3588> who ate <WG2068> were four <WG5070> thousand <WG5070> men, <WG435> besides <WG5565> women <WG1135> and children. <WG3813>
And sending <WG630> away <WG630> the multitudes, <WG3793> He got <WG1684> into the boat, <WG4143> and came <WG2064> to the region <WG3725> of Magadan. <WG3093>
